title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2130/98 of 5 October 1998 repealing Regulation (EC) No 370/98 adopting exceptional support measures for the market in pigmeat in Germany
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2130/98 of 5 October 1998 repealing Regulation (EC) No 370/98 adopting exceptional support measures for the market in pigmeat in Germany
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 October 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
